name: 5 Seconds (Oxyo, Darkbuilder646, iesnihS)
description:
Inputs :

                    Left Click : Interact

                    Mouse scroll : Slow time

                    Left Click + Drag : Move cube

                    Right click + Scroll : Zoom

     In 5 Seconds, your mission is to awoken the consciousness of a robot by unlocking a cube filled with puzzles, representing its mind.

You have only 5 secondes to solve the puzzles, but maybe there's a way to get around that...

How to install

1/ Download 

2/ Extract the files

3/ Launch 5Seconds.exe

4/ Enjoy
